function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Pandemic diseases transcending international borders","Impact":"Global spread of disease, high mortality rates, strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"International cooperation, early detection and response, vaccination campaigns","Technologies":"Global surveillance systems, vaccine development technologies","People":"Global population, healthcare workers, vulnerable populations","Owner":"World Health Organization, national governments, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Transmission of diseases through various sources (circulation, respiration/air, human/animal body, water, clothing, surfaces)","Impact":"High risk of contamination and transmission, rapid spread of diseases","Mitigation":"Improved sanitation, air filtration, personal protective equipment, public health education","Technologies":"Sanitation systems, air filtration technologies, PPE manufacturing, public health communication tools","People":"Global population, healthcare workers, communities","Owner":"Public health organizations, governments, community leaders"},{"Description":"Historical precedent of quarantine in epidemic control","Impact":"Disruption of daily life, social and economic impact, mental health challenges","Mitigation":"Improved quarantine protocols, telemedicine, mental health support systems","Technologies":"Remote healthcare technologies, mental health apps, telecommunication tools","People":"Global population, individuals in quarantine, healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, mental health professionals, governments"}]}
